        public void addPlayer(java.lang.String name,

        Parameters:
        name - name for the player
        petNum - number of pets the player will have

      • start

        public void start()
        Code that is run before the first day of the game is started calls createItems to initialise all Toy/Food items for the game then gives each player a few starting items

      • managePets

        public void managePets(Player p)
        Manages the pets of a specific player at the start of each turn Used to change stats and add actions
        Parameters:
        p - player whose pets need to be managed

      • dayScore

        public void dayScore()
        Calculates the day score for all players. The scored depends on the pets health hunger and mood, higher levels give more score Score is greatly affected if any pets are dead at the end of the round
